refined_prompts.original_description: Showcase a variety of healthy foods and exercise activities
refined_prompts.enhanced_prompt: Create a vertical format video (9:16 aspect ratio, 1080x1920) featuring a cinematic montage of vibrant, fresh produce in motion. Begin with a slow-motion close-up of water droplets falling on colorful vegetables, transitioning to a dynamic sequence of fresh fruits arranged in a spiral pattern. Include a person in athletic wear performing yoga poses in a sun-lit modern gym setting. Use depth of field effects and smooth camera movements. Color palette: rich greens, bright oranges, and clean whites. Lighting should be bright and natural with soft shadows.
alternative_prompts: Vertical lifestyle video (9:16) showing a minimalist kitchen scene with floating healthy ingredients, dynamic particle effects connecting fresh produce, person preparing healthy meal, soft bokeh background, cinematic color grading
Vertical fitness motivation clip (9:16) featuring split-screen transitions between healthy meals and corresponding exercise movements, lens flares, atmospheric lighting, modern gym setting

refined_prompts.original_description: Display before and after transformation images
refined_prompts.enhanced_prompt: Generate a vertical format transformation sequence (9:16, 1080x1920) showing a dramatic lifestyle change. Use parallel sliding transitions between before/after scenes. Include floating motivational text with modern typography. Show a person's transformation journey through time-lapse style progression, maintaining consistent framing. Add lens flares and particle effects during transitions. Color grade: warm highlights, teal shadows.
alternative_prompts: Vertical split-screen transformation video (9:16) with synchronized before/after movements, ethereal lighting, floating achievement metrics, and subtle motion graphics
Vertical progress journey (9:16) using mirror effect transitions, showing lifestyle changes through seasonal variations, dynamic text overlays, cinematic color grading

model_specific_tips: Use Runway Gen-3 for smooth transitions and realistic human movements
Hailuo-02 excels at particle effects and text integration
Pika Labs recommended for dynamic camera movements
